bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Ellen M. O'Connor, 9 March [1874]
bibl.orgName: The Henry W. and Albert A. Berg Collection of English and American Literature, New York Public Library

revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: Yours rec'dreceived last night. The let up & somewhat favorable condition mentioned in my letter of Sunday still continues. Have not the slightest idea of hastening to W[ashington]—Shan't come till I get good & ready. Continue to write often. Wish Ch.Charles to write me all news, & oftener.
